title: v1.6.3.4-v12 docs update
details:
v1.6.3.4-v12 documentation update completed. Key changes documented:
1. Storage Corruption Fix - pendingWriteCount, lastCompletedTransactionId
2. Manager List Clears Fix - _safeClearRenderedTabs(userInitiated), _verifyAllTabsDOMDetached()
3. Position/Size Updates Fix - _checkDOMExists() in UpdateHandler
4. Duplicate Quick Tabs Fix - _findDOMElementById(), _tryRecoverWindowFromDOM(), render() refactoring
5. Yellow Indicator Fix - validateStateConsistency(), clearSnapshotAtomic()
6. Enhanced Diagnostic Logging - Transaction sequencing, Map operations logs

Files updated: copilot-instructions.md and all 4 quicktabs-*.md agent files, plus version updates in 8 other agent files.
